metadata.title: CVE-2023-3195 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-based buffer overflow issue was found in ImageMagick'scoders/tiff.c. This flaw allows an attacker to trick the user into openinga specially crafted malicious tiff file, causing an application to crash,resulting in a denial of service.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
